contentrichtext.text: '''Zinda''' is a [[Persian language|Persian]] word meaning "live". It is also used in [[Hindi]] and [[Urdu]] and can refer to: * [[Zinda (magazine)|''Zinda'' (magazine)]], the largest online magazine serving the Syriac-speaking community around the world * [[Zinda (film)|''Zinda'' (film)]], a 2006 Bollywood film * [[Lady Blackhawk]] (Zinda Blake), a DC Comics character and member of The Blackhawks and Birds of Prey == People == * [[Zinda Kaul]] (1884–1965), Kashmiri poet * [[Zinda Kaboré]] (1920–1947), politician of Voltaic origin {{disambiguation}}
